scriptmanager.charts

Class ScalingPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.charts.ScalingPlotter

  • public class ScalingPlotter
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods for building charts for the Scaling Factor tool (particularly NCIS-related plots).
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    ScalingFactor

    • Method Detail

      • generateXYplot

        public static org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel generateXYplot(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> Xaxis,
                                                        java.util.List<java.lang.Double> Yaxis,
                                                        double scalingTotal,
                                                        double scalingRatio,
                                                        java.lang.String title,
                                                        java.lang.String xName,
                                                        java.lang.String yName)
        Plot the list of (x,y) coordinates from two parallel data array inputs and decorate with customized figure labels.
        Parameters:
        Xaxis - list of x values
        Yaxis - list of y values
        scalingTotal - draw a red line at the y-axis for this value
        scalingRatio - draw a red line at the x-axis for this value
        title - title of chart
        xName - label for x-axis
        yName - label for y-axis
        Returns:
        the built scatter plot

      • initializeLogAxis

        public static org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis initializeLogAxis()
        Initialize a log-scale axis that is black and bounded from 1 to 1 million (1e7). (helper method for generateXYplot)
        Returns:
        the formatted log-scale axis

      • getMin

        public static double getMin(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> vector)
        Return the minimum value in a list of Doubles
        Parameters:
        vector - the list to search
        Returns:
        min value, Double.MAX_VALUE if empty list

        public static double getMax(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> vector)
        Return the maximum value in a list of Doubles
        Parameters:
        vector - the list to search
        Returns:
        max value, -Double.MAX_VALUE if empty list
